articles.description: Gene Hackman has been found dead along with his wife in their New Mexico home. Police found their bodies Wednesday, but investigators believe they may have been dead for some time. Hackman was a prolific actor who performed as an array of heroes and villains …
articles.content: Gene Hackman, a Hollywood giant and two-time Oscar winner, was found dead along with his wife and dog in their New Mexico home Wednesday, though investigators believe they may have been dead for some… [+6114 chars]

articles.title: Fans blast Justin Timberlake after he cancels final concert of US tour minutes before showtime - Page Six
articles.description: “Canceling bc of being sick is 100% understandable.. Canceling 10 minutes before the doors were to open is unacceptable,” one netizen fumed on social media.
articles.content:
Fans are pissed since Justin Timberlake had to hang up his suit and tie after coming down with the flu.

articles.description: Michelle Trachtenberg's cause of death was revealed Thursday after the 39-year-old actress was found dead in New York City Wednesday morning.
articles.content:
Michelle Trachtenburg's cause and manner of death have officially been released.
